name: HMService
desc: A controllable feature of an accessory, like a light attached to a garage door opener.

items.name: var characteristics: [HMCharacteristic]
items.desc: An array of characteristics for the service.

items.name: class HMCharacteristic
items.desc: A specific characteristic of a service, like the brightness of a dimmable light, or its color temperature.

items.name: var name: String
items.desc: The user specified name of the service.

items.name: func updateName(String, completionHandler: (Error?) -> Void)
items.desc: Updates the name of the service to the specified string.

items.name: var uniqueIdentifier: UUID
items.desc: A unique identifier for the service.

items.name: var localizedDescription: String
items.desc: The localized description of the service.

items.name: var isPrimaryService: Bool
items.desc: A Boolean value that indicates whether this service is the primary service on the accessory.

items.name: var isUserInteractive: Bool
items.desc: A Boolean value that indicates whether this service supports user interaction.

items.name: var associatedServiceType: String?
items.desc: The type of the service associated with an outlet or a switch.

items.name: func updateAssociatedServiceType(String?, completionHandler: (Error?) -> Void)
items.desc: Associates the service type of the plugged-in device with a switch or an outlet service.

items.name: var linkedServices: [HMService]?
items.desc: An array of service objects that represents all the services to which the service links.

items.name: var accessory: HMAccessory?
items.desc: The accessory that provides this service.
